style-nit: Could make this multiline to avoid very long lines?
Right, usually the one-per-line approach is preferred for these, not only because long lines are inconvenient but also as it makes it easier to review as well as rebase changes
Could you add a commit to also exclude lib64, please. This shows up when compiling with clang-8 for example:\n\nhttps://pbs.twimg.com/media/ELKJFh3XsAAM6mJ?format=png&name=medium
Done! Guessing that I should squash the commits too?
I think it's fine to have these as separate commits, they're not really related
Sounds good, will keep it as is! üëå
